fullText: This gorgeous revival of Stephen Sondheim's beloved musical is a triumph that honors the late composer's legacy while breathing fresh life into the familiar fairy tale.
dtliExcerpt: This gorgeous revival of Stephen Sondheim's beloved musical is a triumph that honors the late composer's legacy while breathing fresh life into the familiar fairy tale.
